name: EMAIL Token
description: EtherMail is the leading email platform connecting Web2 and Web3, making it simple for users and brands to enter and explore the world of Web3. EtherMail offers users encrypted peer-to-peer email communication, wallet integration, and rewards for reading promotional emails. EtherMail helps businesses and brands extend their reach and engagement by sharing relevant content with NFT and Token holders, forging lasting relationships. With more than 1M users and endorsements from over 100 prominent companies, backed by investors such as Tim Draper, fabric and Greenfield, EtherMail delivers an unprecedented boost in read and interaction rates through incentivized engagement.
